statement.p: The graph below shows the distance a cat is from his bowl of milk over time. Which sentence is a good match for the graph?Â

ol.li: The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 3 feet per second.
The cat was 6 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 3 seconds.
The cat was 3 feet away from the milk and ran toward it reaching it after 6 seconds.
The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 2 feet per second.
The cat was 6 feet away from the milk and ran away from it at a rate of 3 feet per second.

ul.li: D: The cat ran away from the milk at a rate of 2 feet per second.
